original: Lindström, Bengt Anders, disponent, Linköping, f. 15/1/03 i Gbg av John L. o. Frida Sandquist. G. 34 m. tandläk. Britta Karleson. Barn: Inger f. 35. — Genomg. Gbgs h. la-tinlärov. samt Gbgs handelsinst. Anst. v. A-B Ernst Ljunggren i Gbg 22-31, v. A-B K. A. Ullholm i Linköp. sed. 31, disp. där. Led. av styr. f. Sv. Strump-fabr. A-B, Linköp. teaterfören. o. Stadsteatern Linköp.-Norrköp., ordf. i Gbgs gille i Linköp., sekr. i Linköp. golfklubb.
translated: Lindström, Bengt Anders, manager, Linköping, b. 15/1/03 in Gothenburg to John L. and Frida Sandquist. Married in 1934 to dentist Britta Karleson. Children: Inger b. 1935. Attended Gothenburg Latin School and Gothenburg School of Business. Employed by A-B Ernst Ljunggren in Gothenburg from 1922-1931, then by A-B K. A. Ullholm in Linköping from 1931 as a manager there. Member of the board of directors of Swedish Stocking Factory A-B in Linköping, Linköping Theatre Association, and Linköping-Norrköping City Theatre. Chairman of Gothenburg Guild in Linköping, secretary of Linköping Golf Club.
